topic.title: 2.2.2 Emergency Stop Switch Is Pressed During Spindle Rotation

header.para: Emergency Stop Switch Is Pressed During Spindle Rotation

body.para: If the Emergency Stop switch is pressed during Spindle rotation, the Spindle stops rotating immediately (including orientation).
At this point the Spindle orientation condition (retained electrically) is cancelled and the Spindle is released with Spindle rotation setting (S function) is invalidated.
If the tool is unclamped, the Emergency Stop function automatically clamps the tool.
Perform the following procedure when recovering from Emergency Stop condition.

li.text: Exercise extreme care when recovering the machine from the Emergency Stop condition as serious accidents may occur.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:4px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: When working with other personnel, maintain clear communication at all times to prevent serious injury.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:4px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: Contact your Makino service representative for assistance if serious damage to the machine has occurred.

li.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:3px; margin-right:4px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:4px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
li.text: If operation cannot be recovered using the manual recovery procedure, do NOT attempt to solve the problem. Contact your Makino service representative for assistance.

list.li: Make sure the condition(s) that led to pressing of the Emergency Stop switch are eliminated.
Rotate the Emergency Stop switch in the direction indicated by the arrow to release the lock.
Press the [NC RESET] key on MDI panel. Reset the rotation speed via S function.
Restart the Spindle rotation using either M03 or M04 function or by pressing the [SPINDLE START] switch.

body.para: Follow the standard procedure prior to normal machining operation.
